       Hell Beast looked at his WOUNDS, and the MECH the FLOWED from his D=
EEP 
CUTS and SORES. Taking out his chain gun, he pointed it at Death, and =
fired.

       Ramapge grabbed War from behinde and slammed him onto the ic=
y ground. 
He took out his missle launcher and fired, point blank.

       =
Inferno and Paralysis both opened fire on Pestalence. Inferno sent a 
flow =
of fire, while Paralysis sent several optic lasers at the bot.

       Tank=
kor charged his turret, and sent a huge plasma discarge at P1000.

       B=
lack Aracnia, with a BLEEDING Cut, shot her Bowcaster at Famine. 
Then, wit=
h her back mounted Spider Machine gun legs, she sent a spitfire at 
him.

 =
      Nighteyes and Gremlin went after Apocalypse. She took out a saber, an=
d 
dug it into The large bot, with Gremlin opened fire with a plasma riffle=
. 





Death saw aracnia and was disappointed at the miss of his spear. Th=
e spear 
was in deep enough into=A0=A0 hellbeats's shoulder to hold him so =
he=A0 flipped 
around up and behind aracnia. He pulled out his reaper as he=
 landed and put 
it across her throat and yanked it hard and strong right t=
o left. He used his 
left hand to shot his wrist blasts at hell beast.

=A0=
 Proto1000 decided to take his chances. He formed a sharp dagger with his 
=
right hand and made a shield with the left. He dove at the disracted hell 
=
beast and attempted to put the dagger through the=A0 back of the bots neck.=


=A0 Apocalypse saw the triple attack on hell beast. He watched as the bot=
 death 
tried to put the spear through his back. he jettesend towards aracn=
ia and 
landed infront of her at the same time the new bot in the pure liqu=
id metal 
form attacked hell beast and death attempted to slit aracnia's th=
roat. He 
took his sword and drove it at her spark center. He turned in the=
 corner of 
his eye and watched as War came from hell beats's right side ab=
out 10 feet 
from him and shot multiple wrist shots at his side. Famine cam=
e at hell 
beasts legs and tried to drive the needle in his finger in his c=
afe muscel. 
It would nock him out cold if it entered him. Peastlense took =
his blade and 
joined in on the attack=A0 on hell beast and tried to drive =
his sword through 
the bots back.
